text: signage is v confusing, just ask the driver for the desto to be safe. otherwise a pretty standard elongated heightened rain covering metal plate with bumrests where yellow things on wheels spawn
2-5-25 afternoon malaysia 2nd link to bukit indah bus wait long times. too bad service.

Good experience to travel by the bus to JOHOR Bahru. The bus stop is pretty easy to spot except little confusing for the different buses arriving and departing. You must be careful and alert to spot your bus. Thought conductor will help you to advise on your route but it could be messy during the peak hours

Fast and manageable queue for a nice Sunday morning at Tuas Link from Boon Lay to Bukit Indah on CW6 SGD5.00 per pax. This is the Sunday before the coming CNY in a few days.
